manifesto.title: Why Cerneo?
manifesto.paragraph1: The name Cerneo is born from the fusion of two words: Cerne, the core, the essence, the solid foundation, and Neo, the new, the evolution, the future.
manifesto.paragraph2: We believe that all great technology starts with a solid foundation. We don't just build software. We build the foundations upon which entire businesses transform.
manifesto.paragraph3: Every Cerneo product is designed with clean architecture, SOLID principles, and an obsession with quality. Because the future of technology demands more than code. It demands engineering.

logo.item2Desc: Hexagons fit perfectly together, without gaps. Our products are designed for seamless integration.
logo.item3Desc: Hexagonal geometry appears in molecular engineering, beehives, and crystals. It represents precision and purpose.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Cerneo was born from the vision of creating a technology holding that doesn't just develop software, but builds solutions with real engineering.
story.paragraph2: Founded by software engineers passionate about quality, Cerneo brings together under one umbrella products that share a common technological foundation: clean architecture, tested code, and user-centered design.
story.paragraph3: Our name, a fusion of Cerne (essence) and Neo (new), reflects our commitment: building the new from solid foundations.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Cerneo Tecnologia Ltda. ("Cerneo", "we") values the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data in compliance with applicable data protection laws.

collection.title: 2. Data Collected
collection.content: We may collect the following personal data:
items: Identification data: name, email, phone, tax ID
Usage data: pages visited, browsing time, IP address
Device data: browser type, operating system, screen resolution
Voluntarily provided data: contact messages, feedback

usage.title: 3. Use of Data
items: Provide and improve our services and products
Communicate updates, news, and relevant information
Ensure the security and integrity of our systems
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
Statistical analysis and user experience improvement

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties for commercial purposes. We may share data with: essential service providers (hosting, analytics), legal authorities when required by law, and Cerneo group companies for operational purposes.

storage.title: 5. Storage and Security
storage.content: Your data is stored on secure servers with encryption in transit and at rest. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
items: Confirm the existence of data processing
Access your personal data
Correct incomplete or outdated data
Request anonymization, blocking, or deletion of data
Request data portability
Revoke consent at any time

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: To exercise your rights or clarify questions about this policy, contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO) at: privacy@cerneo.com.br

acceptance.content: By accessing and using Cerneo Tecnologia Ltda. ("Cerneo") services, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, do not use our services.
